title.rendered: MOTOTRBO™ DP4000e SERIES PORTABLE TWO-WAY RADIOS

content.rendered:
Models:

  • DP4800e (full keypad)
  • DP4801e (full keypad, GNSS Bluetooth and WiFi as standard)
  • DP4601e (limited keypad, GNSS Bluetooth and WiFi as standard)
  • DP4400e (no keypad)
  • DP4401e (no keypad, GNSS Bluetooth and WiFi as standard)

Features

  • Indoor location tracking
  • Multi-constellation GPS for increased location accuracy
  • Integrated Wi-Fi
  • Over-the-air software updates
  • Enhanced audio quality
  • Improved expandability,
  • Better battery life (up to 28 hours)
  • Better range (up to 8%)
